layout.subtitle: Sign in or register to manage your health reports

login.title: Sign in

errors.email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.password: Password must be at least 6 characters

register.subtitle: Upload health reports and receive AI insights after registering

errors.email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.password: Password must be at least 6 characters

overview.title: Welcome back to BodyLog
overview.subtitle: Get a quick snapshot of your health and continue uploading new reports.

recent.title: Most recent report
recent.aiSummary: Retest fasting glucose within a week, maintain a low-fat, low-salt diet, and add regular cardio.

upload.title: Upload health report
upload.subtitle: Supports JPG/JPEG/PNG/BMP/PDF, single file up to 20 MB. The system parses the data and generates AI insights automatically.
upload.formDescription: Files are stored securely in a private Supabase bucket and are only accessible to you.

form.dropHint: Drag & drop a file here, or click to browse

upload.statusDescription: Uploads are queued and processed asynchronously.

status.idle: Select a file and submit to start processing.
status.queued: Upload complete. The report is queued for processing and will appear under "Reports" shortly.
status.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

tips: Ensure text is clear and not rotated or reflective.
PDF files can contain multiple pages; each page will be processed.
After processing, check the "Reports" section for status and details.

errors.size: File size exceeds the 20 MB limit

reports.title: My reports
reports.subtitle: Filter uploaded reports by date and status.
reports.tableSubtitle: Once processing finishes you can review AI insights and history here.
reports.empty: No reports yet. Upload your first report to get started.

detail.title: Report detail
detail.subtitle: Review the original file, structured metrics, and AI insights.
detail.structuredEmpty: No structured data yet. Processing may still be running.
detail.aiDescription: For reference only. Consult your physician for medical advice.
detail.aiEmpty: AI insights are not available yet. Please refresh later.
detail.aiDisclaimer: Generated by AI and not a medical diagnosis.
detail.originalDescription: Accessible via a time-limited signed URL.
detail.originalEmpty: The original file is not ready yet. Please try again later.

analytics.title: Trends
analytics.subtitle: Track glucose, lipids, and blood pressure over time.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage language, unit preferences, and data export/delete options.
settings.languageDescription: Select your preferred interface language (demo setting)
settings.exportDescription: Exports will include structured data and AI insights. PDF export will be added later.
settings.deleteDescription: Deleting your account removes all reports permanently. Contact support@bodylog.ai to proceed.

general.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

hero.title: Upload your report, get readable AI insights in 30 seconds
hero.subtitle: Images/PDF supported. No OCR needed. Data is structured and archived.

badges.disclaimer: AI insights are not medical advice

value.title: Make your health data readable and useful

ai.title: AI insights
ai.desc: Readable suggestions with references and flags.

trend.title: Trends

upload.title: Upload
upload.desc: Pick an image or PDF report.

insight.title: Insights
insight.desc: Readable AI summary with ranges and flags.

multimodal.title: Structured JSON
multimodal.desc: Unified keys and units for storage.

privacy.title: Privacy‑first
privacy.desc: Private bucket + signed URLs, only you can access.

trendCharts.title: Trend charts
trendCharts.desc: Recharts time series for key metrics.

trust.title: Trust & Security
trust.subtitle: Supabase Storage, RLS, short-lived signed URLs, and OpenRouter audit logs keep data private and traceable.

items.aiDisclaimer: AI insights are not a diagnosis

items.q: Which files are supported? Any limits?
items.a: JPG/PNG/BMP/PDF are supported; single file up to 20 MB.

items.q: Do I need to install OCR?
items.a: No. Reports are parsed directly with a multimodal model.
Files are stored in a private bucket with signed URLs; database uses row‑level security so only you can access your data.
